name: eFax Document
summary: Learn about .EFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Raven Software Star Wars Jedi Knight: Jedi Academy

content: eFax documents can be converted from over fifty different email attachment file types in eFax software, including .PDF, .DOC, .JPG, .XLS, and .HTML.
eFax services are available in Plus, Pro, and Corporate versions.

description: Document created by eFax, a service that sends and receives faxes as document attachments via email; contains email attachment and email body text; can be converted into .PDF or .TIF files using eFax Messenger.
